title: Macrium Reflect Workstation - Server - Server Plus v6.1.936
description:
Macrium Reflect Workstation - Server - Server Plus v6.1.936

Comparision between Workstation, Server and Server Plus:     
http://s19.postimg.org/u0wsw2lgj/Macrium_Reflect_Comparision.png
.
.
.
.
.
How To:
1. Install Macrium Reflect x86 for 32 bit operating system and x64 for 64 bit operating system
2. Copy the path file (x86 for 32bit version and x64 for 64bit version) to the installed folder
3. Patch and it's done
NOTE: Please block the application from connecting to the internet using a firewall, preventing issues with the crack.
.
.
.
.
.
What's New 6.1.936

    Auto decryption of BitLocker partitions in Windows PE
    A new option in the Windows PE rescue media wizard enables automatic decryption of Bitocker encrypted volumes when Windows PE starts. It's also possible to provide a BitLocker Encryption Key (BEK) file on USB stick for additional security. Please see this KB article

Bug Fixes

    Automatic restore not detecting Windows PE 10 boot menu
    When restorng a Windows system drive, the presence of the Windows 10 boot menu was missed to enable auto-restore. This has been resolved.
    Program eror when refreshing the Image restore view
    Rapidly repeated clicks of the 'Refresh' link could cause a program error. This has been resolved
